sources.title: Firetrail | Full Movie | American Civil War
sources.description:
Firetrail - A Confederate Civil War captain faces challenges as the Union army storms through South Carolina, destroying everything in its path. When he is sent to the front lines his home life suffers, which only compounds the soldier's troubles.
2014.  Stars: Jezibell Anat, Gabriel Baxley, Debra Carlsen
